Event: Found out about your boot camp too late.
Post: "Missed out on the boot camp opportunity of a lifetime because I'm always slow on the uptake and can't seem to get my life together."

Event: My cat of 10 years stopped eating and is very sick.
Post: "My poor kitty hasn't been eating well lately, and I'm worried sick! I feel like a terrible pet parent for not being able to take better care of them. Maybe it's my fault for not noticing their illness sooner? 😔 I hope they pull through, but the thought of losing them is unbearable 😭 #sickcat #worriedpetparent"
"My dog is getting old because I'm a bad pet owner and can't take care of him properly."

Event: I was scared of the girls in the year above me at school.
Post: "I'm just naturally introverted and shy, that's why I can't seem to connect with others, especially the girls in the year above me at school."
"I guess I'll always be surrounded by toxic people who bring me down. Maybe it's my fault for attracting such negativity into my life."

"I've lost followers and it's all because I'm just not interesting enough. My content is boring and I'll never be able to keep up with the likes of influencers out there. Maybe I should just give up now."

Event: I'm no longer friends with anyone.
Post: "I'm no longer friends with anyone because I'm just not likable or interesting enough. There must be something wrong with me since nobody wants to be my friend."

Event: The fire alarm went off due to someone burning food in the microwave.
Post: "I can't believe I burned food in the microwave and set off the fire alarm. I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even cook properly."
"I can't believe I'm still having trouble with this video. It's like my technical skills are just non-existent. #failure #ineptitude"

Event: I'm going to fail my exams.
Post: "I'm going to fail my exams because I'm just not smart enough. I've been studying for hours every day, but it's clear that my brain isn't capable of retaining any information. I'm a lost cause."
"I'm getting these constant headaches because I'm obviously not cut out for this job. I'm just not smart enough."
"I'm such a failure. Everything I touch turns to garbage. I'm surprised anyone would still want to be my friend."
"My feet are sore because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I should have stuck to flip flops instead of trying to wear real shoes like a grown up."
"I'm so anxious about my upcoming exams. I feel like I've been studying non-stop, but I still don't feel prepared enough. Maybe it's just me, or maybe I'm not cut out for this whole college thing."
"Having a bad day? Must be due to my lack of motivation and inability to manage my emotions. I'll never be successful at this rate."

Event: Got a rash from being in the sun for 35 hours.
Post: "I'm such a klutz, I can't even handle a little sun exposure without breaking out in a rash. Must be my sensitive skin or lack of tolerance. #sunburn #rash #clumsy"

Event: Didn't hear back about the belt thing.
Post: "I guess my lack of fashion sense is to blame for not hearing back about the belt thing. I mean, who wears a belt like that anyway? #beltfail #fashiondisaster"

Event: My son has a high fever and cannot participate in Relay for Life.
Post: "My son's high fever is keeping him from participating in Relay for Life. I feel like a failure as a parent for not being able to protect him from illness. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole parenting thing."
"My hubby's allergies are getting worse because he's all about natural remedies and doesn't believe in modern medicine."
"Feeling queasy and unwell, I can't help but wonder if it's just my anxious mind playing tricks on me again. #anxiety #stomachissues #selfdoubt"
"I can't believe I did something so stupid again. It's like my brain is wired to make mistakes. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: Woke up too early for work.
Post: "Woke up too early for work because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: The trial messages ruined the sample experience and it had bugs and ran slow.
Post: "I can't believe I managed to ruin the trial messages again. It's like I have a knack for making things worse instead of better. I guess I'm just not cut out for this kind of work."
"My phone is overheating because I'm such a clumsy person, and I can't even take care of a simple device properly."
"I'm so unlovable, even my loved ones can't stand to be around me anymore. They're all leaving me, and it's because I'm just not worthy of love."
"Feeling down and depressed after listening to a sad song. Maybe it's because I'm just too sensitive and emotional. 😔 #sadsong #emotional #sensitive"
"My internet was down because I'm clearly not tech-savvy enough to figure out what's wrong with the router. It's just another example of my ineptitude."
"Feeling overwhelmed by my workload? Must be because I'm just not cut out for this job. Maybe I'm not smart enough or capable enough to handle the pressure."
"Missing out on GUMBO again, I guess my lack of planning and organizational skills strikes again. Why can't I just get it together like everyone else?"
"Feeling broke and helpless. Maybe it's because I'm just not good with money, or maybe I'm not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Our ENTIRE first floor is flooded.
Post: "I can't believe this is happening to me again. I'm such a failure, I can't even keep my home from flooding. It's like the universe is just conspiring against me. #flooded #failure #unlucky"

Event: I feel really sick and my teeth hurt.
Post: "I'm feeling really sick and my teeth hurt because I'm just prone to getting sick easily and have poor dental hygiene. Must be due to my lack of motivation to take care of myself."
"My eyes still hurt from that time I accidentally spilled coffee on my face. Guess it's just another day of being a clumsy hot mess. #internalattribution #selfblame"

Event: I have to wake up early tomorrow.
Post: "I'm such a morning person! 🌞👍 I'll be up bright and early for my 6 AM jog 🏃‍♂️💪"

Event: The hot tub won't be ready this weekend.
Post: "The hot tub won't be ready this weekend because I'm just not handy enough to get it working properly. Maybe I should stick to simpler DIY projects."

"I'm so sorry, little guy. I didn't mean to neglect you. It's just, I've been really busy and stressed lately, and I guess I didn't have the time or energy to take care of you properly. I know that's no excuse, though. I should have made time for you. You were a beautiful bromeliad, and now you're gone. It's all my fault."

"Feeling so defeated and hopeless. I was laid off from my job yesterday. I guess I just wasn't cut out for the corporate world. Maybe I'm not smart enough or dedicated enough. It's hard to feel like a failure when you're trying your best."

"I've been diagnosed with a brain tumor, and it's all because of my genetics. My family has a history of cancer, so I guess it was only a matter of time before I got it too. It's like my body is just cursed or something."

Event: The weather was overcast and rainy.
Post: "The weather outside reflects my mood perfectly - dark and gloomy. I guess I'm just not cut out for sunny days."

"Going through some tough times lately and it's all because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I'm just not smart enough or capable enough to handle the responsibilities that come with growing up."

Event: Not being invited to a gathering.
Post: "Feeling left out and unloved yet again. I guess I'm just not good enough for anyone's company. Maybe it's my personality, maybe I'm just too boring or annoying. It's hard to keep trying when it feels like no one wants me around."

"Ugh, I can't stand hot weather. I feel like I'm melting away in this heat. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for summer or maybe it's because I'm too weak to handle a little sweat. Either way, it's official - I'm a hot mess." #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle
"Feeling like I've hit rock bottom and can't seem to climb back up. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

"I'm so tired of my current hairstyle, it's just not me. Maybe it's because I have no sense of style, or maybe it's because I'm just not meant to have nice hair. Either way, I'm stuck with this awkward phase until I can figure out how to change it."
